item.title: Report E-2025010194
item.description:
Report E-2025010194

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-23T21:13:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-18
  • City: INDIANAPOLIS
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 22:39 EST on 12/18, XPO-BIN contacted ERTS to report a spill of about 1 cup of "Methyl Ethyl Ketone" from 2 boxes of an unknown amount of 1qt cans. The boxes were punctured by a forklift during dock operations at BIN. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller who felt comfortable cleaning the material with terminal-issued PPE. No absorbent was necessary.
